summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Williams Avenue from approximately 150 feet north of Emerson Street to Emerson Street; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17130 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
